Posts.EditableText: Hello! Just got back to Squiffy from a four month hiatus. I have noticed that images in the standalone editor for Windows doesn't seem to work anymore since the update. That is, if the images is in the Resource/app-folder. Online images works fine! All I get is the image text, i.e: but no image appear when I run my game. Anyone experienced the same thing or know about a fix? Have tried it on two different computers.
Posts.HTML:
Hello!

Just got back to Squiffy from a four month hiatus.

I have noticed that images in the standalone editor for Windows doesn't seem to work anymore since the update. That is, if the images is in the Resource/app-folder. Online images works fine!

All I get is the image text, i.e:

<img src="imagename.jpg"style="width:620px;height:415px"align="right">

but no image appear when I run my game.

Anyone experienced the same thing or know about a fix?

Have tried it on two different computers.

Posts.EditableText: Solved it! In the new Squiffy version you need to have SPACE between each command. .
Posts.HTML:
Solved it!

In the new Squiffy version you need to have SPACE between each command.

.
